document_name: Law on Protection from the Negative Impacts of Climate Change
document_url: https://cdn.climatepolicyradar.org/MNE/2019/MNE-2019-01-12-Law on Protection from the Negative Impacts of Climate Change_319a8f75fb2ae713da39f8065e1f9c28.pdf
document_description: This law sets the legal framework for adaptation and mitigation actions in the country, as well with regard to the protection of the ozone layer. It further lays out a strategy for low-carbon development and a climate change adaptation plan.
